The Contents of input file:
10
4 4
5 5
3 3
2 2
-2 -2
-3 -3
2.5 3.5
9.7 9.2
3 2
5 4
0 0

where 0 0 is the reference point supplied[in order to verify output]

(base) mahesh@Mahesh-PC:~/Documents/AlgorithmAnalysis/Assignment-4$ python3 Q1-MergeSort.py < ip

As can be seen, the tree implementation performs better than the merge sort implementation
The reason probably being the Reduced spacial complexity of the Tree Implementation
